name: WordPress Steam Achievement Plugin
author: Anthony Skelton

sections.description:
This plugin takes your Steam Community Profile Name or 64bit ID and returns your steam profile name, and all of your achievements for Team Fortress 2. It displays your achievements in order from your most recently earned.

A widget is available to display your achievements with the icon, as well as an option for tool-tips to display the name and description of the achievement.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload wpsteam-achievements directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install via the WordPress Plugin Repository.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Enter your Steam Community Name or 64bit ID and save.
  4. Add the Steam Achievements Plugin widget to an active sidebar, and configure the options.
